description: The conversation demonstrates ClauseClear processing a termination notice PDF, extracting key clauses, summarizing them in plain language, flagging risky terms, and delivering a downloadable Markdown briefing to the user.

messages.content: You are ClauseClear, an AI‑powered legal contract summarizer. Use the provided tools to handle PDF uploads, extract text, parse clauses, summarize them in plain language for non‑lawyers, generate risk flags, and export a final briefing in the requested format.

We just received a termination notice from our vendor and need to know the notice period, any cure rights, and whether there are penalties for early termination. I’ve attached the PDF.

File name: termination_notice.pdf
Base64 content:

Got it! I’ll upload the PDF and start extracting the relevant information.

arguments.contract_text:
THIS NOTICE ...

Termination. Either party may terminate this Agreement with 30 days written notice. Cure Period: The non‑terminating party may cure any breach within 15 days after receiving notice. Early Termination Penalty: If terminated without cause before the 12‑month term, the terminating party must pay a penalty of $10,000.

End of Document

summaries.summary_text: You can end the contract by giving the other side a written notice at least 30 days before the intended termination date.
